document_data.title: The Magic Encyclopedia Volume One
document_data.author:
[[Connie Rae Henson]]
[[slade|Dale "slade" Henson]]
document_data.mainbody: '''The Magic Encyclopedia volume One''' is the first of a pair of 2nd edition books containing a vast collection of mundane items, their [[magic]]al equivalents, and some unique [[magic item]]s  from A-G sourced from other AD&D products. It was published in August 1992.

Magic.Items: {{P|''[[antennae of triangulation]]''|20}} • {{P|''[[apparatus of Kwalish]]''|21}} • {{P|''[[cyclocone]]''|50}} • {{P|''[[Daern's instant fortress]]''|60}} • {{P|''[[figurine of wondrous power]]''|57}} • {{P|''[[fur of warmth]]''|60}} • {{P|''[[sovereign glue]]''|63}}

Locations.Planes: {{P|[[Elemental Plane of Fire]]|45}} • {{P|[[Para-elemental Plane of Ice]]|60}}
